thread.title: Jimmy Kimmel trolled Matt Damon at the Oscars because what else did you expect
thread.title_full: Jimmy Kimmel trolled Matt Damon at the Oscars because what else did you expect

author: Martha Tesema
title: Jimmy Kimmel trolled Matt Damon at the Oscars because what else did you expect
text:
The feud of the decade that you thought would be over by now is definitely not over.
Matt Damon and Jimmy Kimmel's hilarious, and sometimes overdrawn, bit in which they low-key hate each other made it's way to the 89th Academy Awards where Kimmel took as many jabs as he could at his mortal enemy, Damon.
SEE ALSO: Oscars 2017: Full winners list
Whether it was pretending to be deeply moved by Damon's 2011 We Bought A Zoo, or slipping in subtle jabs throughout the night, it was clear that the fight between the two is not going to die any time soon.
Jimmy Kimmel's years-long feud with Matt Damon doesn't stop just because it's the #Oscars pic.twitter.com/E1dGkiDbaV
â€” Mashable (@mashable) February 27, 2017
The gag escalated when Damon joined Ben Affleck on the stage to present an award and Kimmel, who was conducting the live orchestra, silenced the actor by drowning him out with the swell of strings.
Your move, Damon.
BONUS: 'Get Out' rips the mask off a monster we know too well
